description: Numbers n such that n and n + 8 both prime.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
A. Granville and G. Martin, Prime number races
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Twin Primes
mathematica: Select[Range[1000], PrimeQ[#] && PrimeQ[#+8]&] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Aug 29 2008 *)
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [0..1000] | IsPrime(n) and IsPrime(n+8)]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 20 2010(PARI) is(n)=isprime(n)&&isprime(n+8) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jul 01 2013
author: _David W. Wilson_
